definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control

sentences.english: Note the 2x102 degree horizontal beam width.
sentences.chinese: 请注意2x102度水平波束宽度。

sentences.english: Because of the accuracy requirements of tracking radar, the beam width is very narrow.
sentences.chinese: 跟踪测量雷达因其精度要求，波束宽度很窄。

sentences.english: This caused the beam to be swept in a small cone.
sentences.chinese: 它使波束只能在很小的锥角里扫描。

sentences.english: It is obvious that beam splitter is an important component in Quasi-optical Technique.
sentences.chinese: 波束分离器是准光技术中的重要元件。

sentences.english: The simulation of high-frequency multibeam sonar image is the main task in the dissertation.
sentences.chinese: 高分辨多波束声纳图像的仿真是本文的主要任务。

sentences.english: Multi-beam display is an important means of target detection in digital sonar.
sentences.chinese: 数字式声纳的多波束显示是检测目标的重要手段。

sentences.english: A phased array antennas element with wide-beam is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种新型的宽带宽波束相控阵天线单元。

sentences.english: Transmit and receive eigen-beamforming was employed in the presence of deteriorative fading correlation.
sentences.chinese: 采用发送和接收特征波束成型降低信道相关性的影响。

sentences.english: A real-time obstacle-avoiding expert system based on a multibeam forward looking sonar is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于多波束前视声纳的实时避障专家系统。

sentences.english: A beamforming model of multi-beam direct-radiating array antenna is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了直接辐射阵列多波束天线波束形成的数学模型。

sentences.english: A beamforming model of multi-beam direct-radiating array antenna is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了直接辐射阵列多波束天线波束形成的数学模型。

sentences.english: Moreover, the elevation and azimuth boresight pointing instability can make RASR and AASR worse repectively.
sentences.chinese: 方位波束指向抖动，会使方位模糊度变差。

sentences.english: Beam Generation Program for computing Phase distribution function and Radiation pattern.
sentences.chinese: 余割波束生成程序的计算相分布函数和辐射模式。

sentences.english: Spatial signal separation can be realized by adaptive beamforming technique.
sentences.chinese: 自适应波束形成可以实现空间信号分离。

sentences.english: The paper describes a kind of circular polarization feed, which is used for shaped beam antenna.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍了一种赋形波束天线用的圆极化馈源。

sentences.english: Based on adaptive technique, a design method for broadband array with frequency invariant beam pattern is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种具有频率不变波束图的宽带基阵设计方法。
